akn:section.akn:heading: Tax abatements for new residential developments — Definitions.

akn:content.akn:p: “Eligible area #2” means Housing Priority Area A, as described in 11 DCMR § 1706.8;
“Eligible area #4” means all real property in Lots 35 and 803 (and any subsequent subdivision or division of those lots) and the alley in between them in Square 2910.
“Eligible real property” means real property that:
“Extremely low-income household” means a household consisting of one or more persons with a household income equal to 30% or less or the area median income.
“Household income” shall have the same meaning as “household gross income” in § 47-1806.06.

“Low-income household” means a household consisting of one or more individuals with a household income equal to, or less than, 80% of the area median income and greater than 50% of the area median income.
“Very low-income household” means a household consisting of one or more individuals with a household income equal to, or less than, 50% of the area median income.
